ygData.subject: Re: Wooden Totem
ygData.msgSnippet: it can be put in the throwing slot if i m correct i ve sold them for 2pp to the vendors. probably won t get much more from PC. ... From: Gregory Egan
ygData.messageBody:
it can be put in the throwing slot if i'm correct i've sold them for 2pp to
the vendors. probably won't get much more from PC.
